wikimedia-globalblocking-blockedtext-all: Woesiw wo IP adrɛɛse kwan wɔ wiki ahorow nyinara do [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Global blocks|blocked on all wikis]].
wikimedia-globalblocking-blockedtext-on-: '''Ntamugyinadze kor anaa no mboree a w'ebisadze no dze dzi dwuma no [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Global blocks|enya wiadze akwansiw]].'''
wikimedia-globalblocking-blockedtext-mis:
Sɛ egye dzi dɛ ɔyɛ mfomdo dɛ woesiw wo kwan a, ibotum ahwehwɛ nsɛm fofor na akwankyerɛ wɔ [[m:Special:MyLanguage/No open proxies|No open proxies]] wiadze nhyehyɛɛ.
Anaa ibebisa akwansiw no ho nsɛm, yɛserɛ [[m:Steward requests/Global|post a request for review on Meta-Wiki]].
